reviewText: If I could give this product zero stars I would.  This DVD would not play.  It was a total waste of money.

This collection of four stories is just so charming.  My children love these books and the DVD is just as gentle and sweet.  I have a DVD player that will play DVDs from all regions.  So, I've not had any issues.  It plays perfectly.
Description doesn't say what format this DVD is in but I was shipped a Region 2 DVD which doesn't work here in the US. My own fault for not checking.
